title: Update regarding OmniCorp Global
story_body:
OmniCorp Global Reports Financial Results for Q2 FY2023

At 07:00 ET, July 27, 2023, OmniCorp Global (OMNI) released its financial results for the second quarter of Fiscal Year 2023.

For the three months ended June 30, 2023, OMNI reported revenue of $1.23 billion, representing a 12% increase from $1.10 billion in Q2 FY2022.

Total sales for the quarter grew 11% year-over-year, driven by strong performance in the company's core business segments.

OmniCorp Global's revenue growth was fueled by a 15% increase in sales from its Technology Solutions division, which accounted for 60% of total revenue.

The company's gross margin expanded 120 basis points to 24.5% in Q2 FY2023, compared to 23.3% in the prior-year period.

As of June 30, 2023, OMNI's cash and cash equivalents totaled $850 million, providing the company with a solid foundation for continued investment in growth initiatives.

OmniCorp Global's Q2 FY2023 financial results demonstrate the company's ability to drive sustained growth and expand its market presence.
